name: [MUGEN/NGPC] Pocket Zan Battle - The Missing Link
name_original: [MUGEN/NGPC] Pocket Zan Battle - The Missing Link
description:
[Introduction] 

The first ever Zan Battle as wanderers and warriors from time and world, they enter the modern age tournament led by the corporation who powered this fighting into a bloodsport street fighter. Only one will walk away with the championship title and earn 100,000G. The place was settled, the invitations were sent all over, Heroes and Proud descend on the field of fighting!

Newcomers and Challengers taken to the fighting stage. Who among them is the chosen skilled fighter? And what lies ahead of them to face their difficult challenge yet? Only to know, you will face the Big Bad Four!

--------------------------------------------------

This is MUGEN based Engine. The fighting game is played in Neo Geo Pocket Graphics. Custom Character Sprites were done by me and use of sources from Sprite Database and Deviantart. I do NOT own these Background Stages! All respective to the owners and those who made them for MUGEN.

I hope you enjoy this game!
